results.name: Number of nondeficient divisors of n.
comment: Number of nondeficient numbers (A023196) dividing n.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
Index entries for sequences related to sigma(n)
mathematica: a[n_] := DivisorSum[n, 1 &, DivisorSigma[1, #] >= 2*# &]; Array[a, 120] (* _Amiram Eldar_, Feb 22 2021 *)
xref: Differs from a derived sequence A341624 for the first time at n=120, where a(120)=8, while A341624(120)=1.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Feb 21 2021
